name: Skully's Tale
description:
Skully's Tale is an exciting and lighthearted 2D top-down JRPG about a cat's journey to find a place to call home. Through Skully's adventure, you will explore a vibrant world full of unforgettable characters like Granny and Mac Donaldson, while listening to a plucky original soundtrack.

The game begins with Skully being thrown out of his home when his owners get a new dog. As he settles into his new life as a stray, he meets a variety of characters and has to battle against them in order to progress. 

Skully's Tale is a heartwarming reminder that there is always someone who loves you and that it's never too late to find where you belong.

Skully in Real Life

Skully's Tale is loosely based on the life of Skully, a 14-year-old stray with a crazy past who found his family.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023, Theme: An End is a New Beginning.
